name: Survey 1
#: Get the user to answer some questions and talk about themselves!
introTexts: To get started, press the microphone button then say or type 'Go'
endEarlyTexts: You'd like to end the survey.
questions: What is your full name please?
Can you tell me your age?
And what is your complete address?
Can you read: “If you can keep your head when all about you Are losing theirs and blaming it on you …”?
